title: At Novopavlivka direction Russian army shelled Hostre, Maksymilyanivka, Kostyantynivka, Urozhayne of Donetsk region. Russian ...
content: At Novopavlivka direction Russian army shelled Hostre, Maksymilyanivka, Kostyantynivka, Urozhayne of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Pobyeda and Urozhayne of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
